idg.alias
---------

Yet another "Alias" add-on for Plone 4.  

Functionality
=============

``idg.alias`` allows you to create
internal links within a Plone site through a reference field. The functionality
is very similar to the ``Link`` content-type for external links.


Tested
======

* tested with Plone 4.0.X

Licence
=======

``vs.alias`` is published under the GNU Public Licence V 2 (GPL 2)
